title: Need help riot!
body: I recently purchased Dragonslayer Vayne and I was going to buy some chroma's for it; and, noticed there is a bundle that is 33% off that comes with the skin I just bought as well as 3 chroma's. I'm out of refunds in the account part of the store need help what do I do?

replies.body: Bundles should be flexible, so buying the skin would reduce the overall price of the bundle for you.  If you have any issues, though, reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing team can find some options for you.
